DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effect of voglibose on the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of vildagliptin in Japanese patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Drug Interaction of Vildagliptin (LAF237) With Voglibose in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diabetic patients with inadequately controlled on diet therapy and exercise therapy (HbA1c in the range 6.5 to 10.0% inclusive by NGSP) Fasting plasma glucose â‰¥ 270 mg/dL A history of Type 1 diabetes or secondary forms of diabetes Treatment of antidiabetic agents including GLP1 analogues within 8 weeks or insulin within 6 months prior to screening Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
